attributes.action: Re-open RAF Chilmark for Civil flying and public use
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
There used to be an airfield at Chilmark in Wiltshire which is no longer open to the public as it is used by the RAF.

I would like to see this airfield re-opened for Civil Flying so pilots and Aviation Enthusiasts from all over the country can come to the Airfield to fly.

It would be good for tourism in the area and also a boost for the local economy.
